item.description:
Join us for a fabulos dancing night with the Jumbo Circus Peanuts band, it's a party to rember. Dress in your favorite costume and dance the night away!  More details will be forthcoming!

If you actually need a description of this event in order to consider attending, there's probably not enough space to fit you in. This is THE night of nights for Peanut fans, the band, and Billie. No advance sale, Open seating. Value-priced cocktails. Sparkling restrooms. Free parking. No smoking. As always, free admission to bona fide Zombie Biker Chicks.

$ 5. pay at the door.

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast Halloween Ball
